Reversal of Fortunes.name: Reversal of Fortunes
Reversal of Fortunes.flavor: A whispered benediction heals the injuries of an ally and gives the attacker a taste of the pain it inflicted.
Reversal of Fortunes.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you hits your ally adjacent to it
Reversal of Fortunes.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage. The ally hit by the triggering enemyâ€™s attack can spend a healing surge and regain 2d10 additional hit points.

Miraculous Grace.name: Miraculous Grace
Miraculous Grace.flavor: Your timely prayer enables your ally to escape certain doom.
Miraculous Grace.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you drops to 0 hit points or fewer
Miraculous Grace.effect: The target regains hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge and regains 2d6 additional hit points. In addition, the target makes a saving throw against each effect on him or her that a save can end.

Reap What You Sow.name: Reap What You Sow
Reap What You Sow.flavor: You denounce a foe, making it suffer all the pains dealt to your friends.
Reap What You Sow.onHit: You transfer all effects that a save can end from each ally within the burst to the target.
Reap What You Sow.onMiss: You transfer one effect that a save can end from each ally within the burst to the target.
